input_args.text: '25 Creepy Encounters With Bizarre Creatures # www.paranormalelite.com 0 \nThis video takes a look at some of the creepiest bizarre creatures that have not only been encountered, but have also been documented on video. From legendary creatures such as Bigfoot to mythical sea creatures like mermaids, this video is an investigation into the most incredibly strange creatures ever spotted by humans. The debate whether these videos are real continues, however it is hard to deny their creepiness factor. Tags'
